appendix.title: Detailed Changes from NISP Version 9 (I) to NISP Version 10 (J)

row.entry:
Type
Types - A: Addition; D: Deletion; U: Updated; E: Errata correction
All profiles now hyperlinked baseline documents
Updated to reference profiles using hyperlinks
103 new standards to Vol 2 of the NISP
20 new standards to Vol 3 of the NISP
Move STANAG 4559 Ed.4 from Volume 2 to Volume 3
Bluetooth 4.2;WS-I Basic Profile 1.2;Common Alerting Protocol Version 1.2;
